short_summary: Amendement à la date de clôture de soumission; remplacement de traceurs d'azote et de soufre à l'état de verre pour les ministères du Ressources naturelles et CanmetENERGY avec une valeur de fourniture estimée à 75,349 CDN.
description: The Department of Natural Resources, CanmetENERGY, has a requirement for the supply, delivery, offloading and installation of two (2) new Trace Nitrogen / Sulfur analyzers to replace existing units in Devon, Alberta and Ottawa, Ontario. All the deliverables must be received on or before 31 March 2023.
full_summary:
# Tender for Trace Nitrogen Sulfur Analyzer for Petroleum Hydrocarbon

## Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the supply, delivery, offloading, and installation of two (2) new Trace Nitrogen/Sulfur analyzers to replace existing units in Devon, Alberta, and Ottawa, Ontario.

## Tender Details

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3756333318
*   **Reference Number:** WS3756333318-Doc3756368844
*   **Publication Date:** 2022-12-14
*   **Closing Date and Time:** 2023-01-13T14:00:00 EST
*   **Amendment Date:** 2023-01-05
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-01-31
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** None

## Procurement Criteria

*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Geographical Scope

*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Ottawa, Devon
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Ottawa, Devon

## Contracting Information

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   **Name:** Erin Kaiser
    *   **Email:** erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Notice URL:** <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14897596?extsite=MTQ4OTc1OTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

## Additional Information

*   **Amendment to Closing Time:** Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-01-13T14:00:00 EST.
*   **Bid Delivery:** All bids submitted after 2023-01-13T14:00:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

## End User Entity

*   **End User Entity
